main.name: Yong Cheng Low
main.description: I aspire to use modern day technologies to improve the lives of others and give users the best possible user interface and user experience

bio.para1: Hello everyone, I am Yong Cheng or my friends call me YC for short. I studied at the National University of Singapore and I minor in Interactive Media Design. My career goal is to create applications with an optimised user interface and a pleasant user experience to improve the efficiency of the workforce.
bio.para2: Some of my works include generating a material list from a given specification of a circuit board at CMR Far East. I also interned at Cudy, an edutech startup who tried to transform the educational industry through online tuition. During my internship there, I was given the opportunity to design and implement user interfaces and enhance the user experience of the payment gateway using Xfers and live streaming services using Temasys.
bio.para3: I also have a passion for sports and organising events to benefit others. During my pre-tertiary education, I represented my school in Badminton and Basketball. I joined the NUS Students’ Computing Club as Vice President (Human Resource & Student Development) to create a vibrant campus life for NUS Computing Students. During my final year at University, I decide to take up Presidency at NUS Students’ Sports Club to influence the entire Sporting scene at NUS. I had the opportunity to work with various student groups and influence projects to promote recreational sports to the rest of the NUS population.
bio.para4: Find me interesting? Send me an email and let's chat

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
